import React from 'react'; import styled from "styled-components"; import Modal from "../../../modal/modal"; import Text from "../../../../theme/text"; import {RowContainer} from "../../../header/header"; import Image from "../../../../theme/image"; import Logo from "../images/logo.png" import Button from "../../../../theme/button"; const Container = styled.div` background: #343434; border-radius: 10px; padding: 40px 75px 30px 150px; width: 775px; z-index: 3; position: relative; `; const ModRowContainer = styled(RowContainer)` margin-bottom: 60px; justify-content: space-between; `; let UpgradeModal = ({setShow}) => { const CancelPropagation = (event) => { event.stopPropagation() } const DoNotReloadPage = (event) => { event.preventDefault() setShow(false) } return (
DoNotReloadPage(event)} onClick={CancelPropagation}>
